Event.name: Authentication
Event.HelpText: Authentication event will corresponds to the OAM Login event.

Event.name: CheckAuthorization
Event.HelpText: Check authorization event corresponds to OAM Authorization event.

Event.name: LockAccount
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles
Event.HelpText: Lock account events corresponds to the OAM User account locked event.

Category.name: Server
Category.HelpText: Audit events generated from the OAM runtime engine operations.

Attribute.name: ResourceHost
Attribute.HelpText: Host name for the resource being protected. This will be the server on which the protected application is hosted.

Attribute.name: RequestID
Attribute.HelpText: Request ID will be used to track the pre authentiactions requests.

Attribute.name: Impersonator
Attribute.HelpText: A user who acts on someone else's behalf

Event.name: AuthenticationAttempt
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme UserDN
Event.HelpText: Authentication Attempt happens when the user tries to access a protected resource and gets redirected to OAM server.

Event.name: SessionCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: OAM server creates a session after the successful authentication.

Event.name: SessionDestroy
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: OAM server session is destroyed when the user logs out. Or Admin terminates the session.

Event.name: Logout
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: User logs out from OAM server.

Event.name: CredentialChallenge
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme UserDN AuthorizationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: User is prompted to provide credentials to authenticate

Event.name: CredentialSubmit
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Roles SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme UserDN AuthorizationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: User submits credentials to get authenticated.

Event.name: ServerStartup
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: Oam server starts up. Application server initilization or the application deployment will be treated as server startup.

Event.name: ServerShutDown
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: OAM server shuts down. Application un-deployment or application server shutdown will be treated as OAM server shut down.

Event.name: CredentialValidation
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme AuthorizationPolicyID
Event.HelpText: Authentication of the user with the supplied credentials against the configured user repository.

Event.name: Login
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Roles AuthorizationScheme AuthorizationPolicyID
Event.HelpText: Login to the OAM server. This includes credential collection and authentication.

Event.name: Authorization
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles ResourceID
Event.HelpText: Authorization of the user.

Event.name: GenericRuntimeOperation
Event.HelpText: Generic event for runtime operation. This audit event can be assisicated to any runtime event..

Event.name: SessionValidation
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles UserDN ResourceID ResourceHost
Event.HelpText: Session validation operation for a request.

Event.name: UserAccountLocked
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: User account locked because of the unsuccessful login attempts or by the administrator.

Event.name: UserAccountUnlocked
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: User account unlocked by administrator.

Event.name: UserImpersonationStart
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: Impersonation of the User has started

Event.name: UserImpersonationEnd
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: Impersonation of the User has ended

Event.name: PluginInvocationStart
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: OAM Plugin invocation has started

Event.name: PluginInvocationComplete
Event.unusedAttributes: Target Resource Roles ApplicationDomainName AuthenticationSchemeID AgentID SSOSessionID AuthorizationScheme ResourceID AuthorizationPolicyID AuthenticationPolicyID ResourceHost RequestID
Event.HelpText: OAM Plugin invocation has completed

Category.name: AdminConsole
Category.HelpText: Audit events generated from the admin operations

Attribute.name: PolicyName
Attribute.HelpText: Name of the authentication or authorization policy

Attribute.name: OldAttributes
Attribute.HelpText: Name value pairs for the attributes

Attribute.name: OldSettings
Attribute.HelpText: Previous Setting or Data being changed by the admin console operation

Attribute.name: NewAttributes
Attribute.HelpText: Name Value pairs for the new attributes

Attribute.name: NewSettings
Attribute.HelpText: Updated Setting or Data resulting from the admin console operation

Attribute.name: ResponseType
Attribute.HelpText: Denoting the type of response. Authentication response or Authorization response

Attribute.name: AgentType
Attribute.HelpText: Type of the agent. OSSO agent or OAM 10g Agent or OAM 11g agent.

Attribute.name: ConstraintType
Attribute.HelpText: Type of constraints. Authentication or Authorization constraints.

Attribute.name: DataSourceType
Attribute.HelpText: Type of the data source, LDAP, DB etc.

Attribute.name: Impersonator
Attribute.HelpText: A user who acts on someone else's behalf

Event.name: ConsoleLogin
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Logging in to the Admin Console.

Event.name: PolicyCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creation of a authentication or authorization policy.

Event.name: PolicyModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modification of the policy.

Event.name: PolicyDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource SchemeName NewAttributes ResponseType AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting the policy.

Event.name: ResourceCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creation of a resource.

Event.name: ResourceModification
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modification of a resource

Event.name: ResourceDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting a resource.

Event.name: SchemeCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating an authentication scheme.

Event.name: SchemeModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modification of an authentication scheme.

Event.name: SchemeDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource NewAttributes AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting an authentication scheme.

Event.name: AgentCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating an agent or a partner application.

Event.name: AgentModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modifying an agent or a partner application.

Event.name: AgentDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: TargetComponentType ApplicationName Resource PolicyName SchemeName NewAttributes ResponseType AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting an agent or a partner application.

Event.name: ServerDomainCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating a server policy domain

Event.name: ServerDomainModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modifying a server policy domain

Event.name: ServerDomainDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting a server policy domain

Event.name: ServerInstanceCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating a server instance.

Event.name: ServerInstanceModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modifying a server instance.

Event.name: ServerInstanceDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Deleting a server instance.

Event.name: DataSourceCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating a data source. Datasource can be an LDAP or a DB or any other data store.

Event.name: DataSourceModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName HostIdentifierName ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Modifying a data source. Datasource can be an LDAP or a DB or any other data store.

Event.HelpText: Deleting a data source. Datasource can be an LDAP or a DB or any other data store.

Event.name: HostIdentifierCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName
Event.HelpText: Creating a Host Identifier.

Event.name: HostIdentifierModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName

Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType ResourceURI ResourceTemplateName

Event.name: GenericAdminOperation
Event.HelpText: Generic Admin operation. This may be configured to any new admin operations without changing the events configuration.

Event.name: ResourceTemplateCreation
Event.unusedAttributes: PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI
Event.HelpText: Creating a resource template. A resource can be created using a Template.

Event.name: ResourceTemplateModification
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI
Event.HelpText: Modifying a resource template. A resource can be created using a Template.

Event.name: ResourceTemplateDeletion
Event.unusedAttributes: Resource PolicyName SchemeName OldAttributes NewAttributes ResponseType AgentID AgentType ConstraintType InstanceName DataSourceName DataSourceType HostIdentifierName ResourceURI
Event.HelpText: Deleting a resource template. A resource can be created using a Template.

Event.HelpText: Creating a Plugin
